Content: The renowned meditation practitioner, Ven Diyasenpura Wimala Thero at the request of the Army conducted one more meditation session, named 'Lakviru'  Spiritual Meditation Programme for five Officers and seventy seven Other Ranks of the Sri Lanka Army at the Security Force Headquarters - East on Thursday (28). Directorate of Psychological Operations at the Army Headquarters coordinated the programme for the benefit of all ranks in the Army.
